short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A security-focused AI Editor that helps you write better and read faster - directly on your current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our cutting-edge Chrome Extension, a security-focused AI Editor that respects your privacy and boosts your productivity. Your data stays yours; we never use it to train our models.

Our AI Editor is designed to enhance your writing and turbocharge your reading experience without ever needing to leave your page. You're just a selection away from refining your text or transforming dense content into a quick read. Simply highlight the text you want to work on, and our tool will spring into action to revise, summarize, or explain the content.

Whether you're composing an important email, drafting a blog post, or trying to digest a complex article, our extension offers a seamless and secure experience. Experience the power of AI at your fingertips, making your browsing, writing, and reading on the web faster and better. Get ready to redefine your online productivity with our new Chrome extension. Try it today!
